== Chapter 1: Local Installation ==
1. The minimal install base environment includes the graphical support. True or False?
     False. Minimal Install base environment does not includ graphics support.
2. Can you install RHEL 8 in text mode?
     Yes, RHEL 8 can be installed in text mode.
3. You can use the /boot partition within LVM to boot RHEL. True or False?
     False. /boot cannot reside within LVM
4. Whick kernel version is the inital release of RHEL 8 based on?
     The initial release of RHEL 8 is based on kernel 4.18
5. Several log files are created and updated in the /tm directory
   during the installation process. where are these files moved to 
   after the completion of installation?
     These files are moved to the /var/log directory
6. Name the RHEL installer program.
     The name of the RHEL installer program is Anaconda
7. How many console screens do you have access to during the 
   installation process?
     There are six console screens avaiable to you during the
     installation process.
8. RHEL 8 may be downloaded from Red Hat's developer site. True
   or False?
     True. RHEL 8 may be downloaded from developers.redhat.com.
     You need ot open a new account or use an existing before you
     can downloaded it.
9. RHEL 8 cannot be installed over the network. True or False?
     False. RHEL 8 can be installed with installation files located on a
     network server.
